Create a tissue box that doubles as a night light: A tissue box with a built-in LED light that can be charged using a USB cable. The light can be adjusted to different colors and brightness levels.
Design a tissue box with a built-in humidifier: A tissue box with a built-in humidifier that can be filled with water or a humidifier solution. The humidifier can be controlled with a button or app.

Create a tissue box with a built-in air purifier: A tissue box with a built-in air purifier that can be activated with a button or app. The air purifier can be used to clean the air in the room and remove allergens.
Design a tissue box with a built-in fan: A tissue box with a built-in fan that can be activated with a button or app. The fan can be used to circulate air in the room and keep the tissue box fresh.

Create a tissue box with a built-in speaker: A tissue box with a built-in speaker that can be activated with a button or app. The speaker can be used to play music or audiobooks while the user is blowing their nose.
